===Salon Caritat Notice===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Salon Caritat Notice:''' To further the study of the law in Fontaine and improve the administration of justice therein. In accordance with the suggestion of some members, this salon will organize the 36th symposium. All members are invited to participate.
:'''Salon Caritat Notice:''' The topic of the 36th symposium will be: "The Current State of Budget Overruns of the Maison Gardiennage and its Connection to the Provision of Public Safety in the Court of Fontaine."
